message:
SYSTEM: Wiki: https://delicias.dia.fi.upm.es/wiki/index.php/NLPinLD 

Ir a LinkedData
Role of NLP in LD

NLP plays an important role to reach "usuarios de a pie".
To this end, it is important to provide methods, techniques and tools for adding this additional layer on top of LOD.
Either we can reuse existing tools, e.g., PowerAqua; or create new ones by adapting existing services, e.g. OpenCalais, Zemanta, etc.
How to do it

High level overview
speaker: SYSTEM
